explanation: Funds are available from section 1421 of the Full-Year Continuing Appropriations, 2025 (division A of Public Law 119-4), appropriated to the Department of Defense and made available for transfer to military personnel accounts, operation and maintenance accounts, and the Defense Working Capital Funds
